text: Thus , Labov may unwittingly have proven his own point that communication can not be achieved if there are perceived or actual language errors ( dialects , slang , creoles have traditionally been described as containing language errors , though they are no longer thus described ) .

4 Answers 4 .Basically , the positive anymore does not simply have the meaning of nowadays , but rather means simply quite the opposite of negative anymore .The negative anymore implies that what is described by the sentence used to be the case , and asserts that it no longer is , the positive anymore implies or asserts that what is described used to NOT be the case , and asserts that it is now .
